About

Here are a couple things I do...

Summary

I am a recent graduate with a Classics degree from King's College London with experience in web development, javascript, music production, live mixing and radio. I love helping people design beautiful virtual spaces to express their work, and engaging with technology in variety of contexts.

Enkidu

Music Producer

I compose rhythmic and atmospheric electronica. Some of my early (and more experimental) songs are published @Enkidu on Sound Cloud and YouTube. I hope to release more recent compositions in an album next year.
